title: Now That's Music - July 2016 320ak
description:
Now That's Music - July 4th 2016 320ak

Alright It's time for the 4th of July installment of my fresh  Hardrock/Metal
series. 

It's another decent batch of music this time, We got 2 Tracks from Wolf Hoffmann of Accept fame he sounding real good doing some Classic classical jams and we got Some Wo Fat with A taste of Doom. And another taste of Doom with a band that got pointed out to me Goatess sounding real good, this band has got crosssover written all over the place and the vocals are very familiar sounding Goatess sounding real good.

DRI is back,and Saliva sounds like they always do, Lanfear and 2 from Hollowstone
Because they got range. And Gloomy Grim are ripping shit up...

And plenty of killer metal from new bands yeah this edition has plenty to kickstart the July season of Heat... 


Tracklist

01  Here to Stay - Ashes in the Sky.mp3
02  Night on Bald Mountain - Wolf Hoffmann;.mp3
03  Purgatory Under New Management - Goatess;.mp3
04  SOS - Fates Warning;.mp3
05  Of Smoke And Fog - Wo Fat.mp3
06  Battle Cry - Hollowstone;.mp3
07  Falling Away - Hollowstone;.mp3
08  Madame Butterfly - Wolf Hoffmann;.mp3
09  Vote with a Bullet - Damnation Machine.mp3
10  Mad Man - D.R.I..mp3
11  Sniper - Breaking The Halo.mp3
12  Scorn - Oracles;.mp3
13  Rx - Saliva.mp3
14  The Mist - Gloomy Grim;.mp3
15. Remain Undone - Lanfear;.mp3
